publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1544 Richard Baker: International Youth Parliament-That the Parliament congratulates Matthew Middler and Fiona Smith of Aberdeen on being selected to represent Scotland at an international youth parliament event in Sydney organised by Oxfam International; welcomes the fact that Fiona Smith's attendance at the event is being supported by UNISON, and notes that the event will discuss key international issues including poverty, social justice, and the environment.
S2M-1544 International Youth Parliament (lodged on 28 June 2004) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1544 Richard Baker: International Youth Parliament-That the Parliament congratulates Matthew Middler and Fiona Smith of Aberdeen on being selected to represent Scotland at an international youth parliament event in Sydney organised by Oxfam International; welcomes the fact that Fiona Smith's attendance at the event is being supported by UNISON, and notes that the event will discuss key international issues including poverty, social justice, and the environment. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S2M-1544 International Youth Parliament (lodged on 28 June 2004) Rosie Kane*, Ms Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1544 International Youth Parliament (lodged on 28 June 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-1544 International Youth Parliament (lodged on 28 June 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
